name: Throh

passive.name: Finisher
passive.effect: When the opponent discards a card, flip a coin. If heads, put it in the Lost Zone instead.

attacks.name: Toprope Slam
attacks.effect: If Throh switched in this or last turn, deal 20 more damage.

flavor: Throh work well with Sawk or on their own. Their karate skills are put on display in tournaments often.
